content.question: Directions: You will hear a series of brief conversations between two speakers. Each exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Je n'ai pas le temps d’y aller.
Je vais commencer tout de suite.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
